channel.title: Model Behavior on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Meta’s AI Recruiting Campaign Finds a New Target
item.description: Meta approached more than a dozen staffers at Mira Murati’s AI startup to discuss joining its new superintelligence lab. One received an offer for more than $1 billion.
